entry.title: 学习-资源
entry.summary:
Linux下的工作

  1. IDE

python -- eric

perl      -- padre

cpp/c,  -- codeblocks, Eclips CDT, codelite, anjuta, Geany, medit as IDE, gedit with plugins.

C#        -- mono develop

exVim   -- Vim IDE

  1. Libs

glib for c (unix, mingw).

libevent : event driven software desgin lib for C/C++

libsig++: event lib for C++

  1. debug

DDD/Nemiver/Kdbg …
entry.content:
Linux下的工作

  1. IDE

python -- eric

perl      -- padre

cpp/c,  -- codeblocks, Eclips CDT, codelite, anjuta, Geany, medit as IDE, gedit with plugins.

C#        -- mono develop

exVim   -- Vim IDE

  1. Libs

glib for c (unix, mingw).

libevent : event driven software desgin lib for C/C++

libsig++: event lib for C++

  1. debug

DDD/Nemiver/Kdbg , gui for GDB. QtCreator c/c++ debug.

4 . hex editor : ghex.

  1. calculator : galculator.

6 . sqlite database man. view : sqliteman.

  1. network: wireshark, ostinato.
  2. diff: meld.
  3. mind:  freemind.
  4. ui embedded : disko, directfb, efl, clutter, kivy.org
  5. photo import management: darktable. gimp, inkscape.
  6. html editing : kompozer
  7. term: terminator, sreen.
  8. code analy : seascope.
  9. enginer: kicad, fritzing, spice-ng,  scilab, R, maxima. python as a tool.
  10. web : webtoolkit : Wt.
  11. Code Generation:  GNU autogen; CodeSmith Generator
  12. 数模与仿真: Scilab && Scicos: Block diagram modeler/simulator
  13. RPC/CORBA (远程过程调用与分布式编程)

libevent, Gnome Orbit2 (http://projects.gnome.org/ORBit2/)， Sun RPC(common unix).

CORBA: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Common_Object_Request_Broker_Architecture

  1. SWIG 语言之间接口转换： http://www.swig.org/

数学工具

sclilab数值计算, maxima代数系统, Rstudio(R)统计学, octave画图的,gnuplot,genius, Sage(python 集合所有c，cpp等写的数学系统·「我喜欢，嘿嘿！」号称是matlab, mapple等的替代品), GNU texmacs

设计模式

MDA, DDD, SOA

Sites

wikibooks:  http://www.wikibooks.org

eBooks

http://www.flazx.us/

http://worldebookfair.com/Collections.aspx

http://asiaing.com/ebooks/20.html

http://www.pdfshu.org

http://www.olezu.com/Ebooks/

Linux-Unix设计思想 Linux嵌入式系统高级程序设计

entry.title: Think what programming (languages) really do ? > translations.
entry.summary:
We write programs everyday, and then compile or "run" directly, think what really programming doing ?

> Translations.

yes, a Cpp program might be 1st translated into C, and then  AS, and then machine code. A shell script can be "run" directly, but it need bash to translate. so, everything on computer …
entry.content:
We write programs everyday, and then compile or "run" directly, think what really programming doing ?

> Translations.

yes, a Cpp program might be 1st translated into C, and then  AS, and then machine code. A shell script can be "run" directly, but it need bash to translate. so, everything on computer might be translations.

And, What would it be if we use parrot for the translation ? Imaging a whole system based on parrot, you write C or Cpp programs, or Python3, or Perl 6, and

then directly "run" on parrot, and you can even write a doc in markdown and then

make parrot to translate for you to html or pdf. this is crazy !

OK, I'm imaging this...  what about you ?
